alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 546 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Plymouth to Peter. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Tremonton, Cache, Smithfield, Hyrum, Wellsville, Lewiston, Clarkston, Trenton, Plymouth, Howell, Benson, Peter, Riverside, Nibley, Garland, Honeyville, Mendon, Elwood and Newton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 372 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 25 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
